float: thumb|Sathorn in Bangkok is a skyscraper-studded business district that is home to major hotels and embassies.  Thailand experienced the world's highest economic growth rate from 1985 to 1996 – averaging 12.4% annually. In 1997 increased pressure on the baht, a year in which the economy contracted by 1.9%, led to a crisis that uncovered financial sector weaknesses and forced the Chavalit Yongchaiyudh administration to Floating exchange r
